name: In search of adventure (Sr Brigão)
description:
In this game you incorporate Belinda and Harvett, two stubborn brothers who run away from their mother in search of adventure, but end up getting lost along the way and have to face monsters and puzzles along the way.

But beware, life is shared between the brothers and at some points you will need each other to get through the challenges.

Belinda Commands:

- Move: Keyboard arrows;

- Attack: K ;

- Jump: L;

Harvett Commands:

- Move: A and D;

- Attack: E;

- Jump: Space bar;
